Deft Download¶

deft.download.download_models(update=False)[source]¶

Download models from S3

Models are downloaded and placed int deft/models. Each model contains a serialized deft classifier and a grounding map and is stored in a directory named after the shortform it disambiguates.

Parameters:update (Optional[bool]) – If True, replace all existing models with versions on S3 otherwise only download models that aren’t currently available. Default: True
deft.download.get_downloaded_models()[source]¶

Returns set of all models currently in models folder

Deft Disambiguate¶

class deft.disambiguate.DeftDisambiguator(classifier, grounding_map, names)[source]¶

Bases: object

Disambiguates longforms in texts for a particular shortform

Checks first if the standard pattern is matched in the text. If it is matched for a unique recognizable longform return this longform. Otherwise use a classifier to predict the correct disambiguation for the longform. If no longform was detected by matching the standard pattern, return the longform the classifier predicted with highest probability. If more than one longform was matched using the standard pattern, return the longform with highest predicted probability among the matched longforms.

Parameters:
  • classifier (py:class:deft.modeling.classify.DeftClassifier) – machine learning model for disambiguating shortforms based upon context
  • grounding_map (dict) – Dictionary mapping longforms to their groundings
  • names (dict) – dictionary mapping groundings to standardized names
shortform¶

shortform to disambiguate

Type:str
recognizer¶

recognizer to disambiguate by searching for a defining pattern

Type:py:class:deft.recognize.DeftRecognizer
labels¶

set of labels classifier is able to predict

Type:set
disambiguate(texts)[source]¶

Return disambiguations for a list of texts

Parameters:texts (list of str) – fulltexts to disambiguate shortform
Returns:result – Disambiguations for text. For each text the corresponding disambiguation is a tuple of three elements. A grounding, a standardized name for the grounding, and a dictionary containing predicted probabilities for different groundings
Return type:list of tuple
deft.disambiguate.load_disambiguator(shortform, models_path='/home/albert/deft/deft/models')[source]¶

Returns deft disambiguator loaded from models directory

Parameters:
  • shortform (str) – Shortform to disambiguate
  • models_path (Optional[str]) – Path to models directory. Defaults to deft pretrained models loaded from s3. User has the option to specify a path to another directory to use custom models
